title: ISTN
name: Interconnection Screening Telephone Number
definition: Identifies the telephone number used for billing or translation purposes.
fieldNotes: The code set is unique to each established trun k group or CCS Link Set and is provided to the customer on the Firm Order Confirmation.  The TSC entry may then be populated by the customer w hen ordering changes, additions or deletions to an existing trunk group or CCS Link Set.
validEntryNotes: This telephone number would be customer owned and identified during customer/provider pre- negotiations.
usageNotes: Prohibited when the ACT field is "D", otherwise optional.
